channel.title: News on Greater London Linux User Group
channel.description: Recent content in News on Greater London Linux User Group

item.title: New New Site
item.description:
Hi all.

Welcome to the new site.

When Positive Internet contacted me last week letting me know I was using PHP 5.6 – which I subsequently realised went out of support about 7 years ago at this point – I had kind of forgotten I was responsible for the server.

In fact, given the site ran Wordpress, I was astounded the site hadn’t been done over.

Postivie Internet kindly let me know that the upgrade might cause Wordpress to break.

item.title: Welcome to the new GLLUG site
item.description:
The old site died with a database error and after several months and no improvement, Iâ€™ve decided to relaunch the site with the fantastic support of Positive Internet, who were also able to swap everything over.

There is still much to do, and it will take time to put everything back together but this is the first step in the right direction. I hope to see you all at a meet soon.

item.title: New (Temporary) Mailing List
item.description:
Due to our long-standing GLLUG maintained mailing list being out of service for over a month now we have joined forces with lug.org.uk and are now running a temporary mailing list with them. Most of the previous subscribers have been re-invited to this new list, but if you are new, welcome and please join our new list.

All the instructions for subscribing are here.
